pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.2: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.3:2.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.3:2.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajanti—
